words.english: There is no god except Allah
than the one who; from those who
time, period; at the time of
one who takes care of a thing for another

words.meaning: to make, to place, to set up
to be true; to say the truth
to bear witness; to be present
to become nigh; to be close to
to be satisfied, to be content
to be safe; to feel safe; to trust
